response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet the highest standards of excellence. This product holds immense value not only financially but also in terms of its unique features and benefits that align perfectly with your needs and aspirations. Given its worth of $1,000,000 to you, I am offering it to you at an exclusive price of $950,000. This special offer is designed to ensure that you have the opportunity to acquire this exceptional item at a highly competitive rate, maximizing your savings while securing an investment of significant value. I trust that you will find this proposal favorable and look forward to the possibility of bringing this remarkable product into your possession.", "product_price": 950000}
